Detailed Description

AITask Implementation of the ISystemTask interface for AI.

void AITask::Update ( f32  DeltaTime  )  [protected, virtual]

Implementation of the ISystemTask::Update function. Function informing the task to perform its updates. This does all the work needed to update AI for this frame.

Parameters:
DeltaTime The time delta from the last call.
See also:

Implements ISystemTask.

virtual Bool AITask::IsPrimaryThreadOnly ( void   )  [inline, protected, virtual]

Implementation of the ISystemTask::IsPrimaryThreadOnly function. This function returns False for AITask. AITask does not need to run only on the primary thread.

Returns:
Bool - Returns if this system should only run on the primary thread.

ISystemTask::IsPrimaryThreadOnly
